defines.name: RAYGUIAPI
defines.description: We are building the library as a Win32 shared library (.dll)

structs.name: Texture
structs.description: It should be redesigned to be provided by user

structs.name: Image
structs.description: Image, pixel data stored in CPU memory (RAM)

structs.name: Font
structs.description: It should be redesigned to be provided by user

fields.name: recs
fields.description: Rectangles in texture for the glyphs

structs.name: GuiStyleProp
structs.description: NOTE: Used when exporting style as code for convenience

structs.name: GuiTextStyle
structs.description: NOTE: Text style is defined by control

enums.name: GuiControlProperty
enums.description: Gui base properties for every control

values.name: BORDER_WIDTH
values.description: Control border size, 0 for no border

values.name: TEXT_PADDING
values.description: Control text padding, not considering border

values.name: TEXT_ALIGNMENT
values.description: Control text horizontal alignment inside control text bound (after border and padding)

values.name: TEXT_ALIGNMENT_VERTICAL
values.description: Text vertical alignment inside text bounds (after border and padding)

values.name: ARROW_PADDING
values.description: DropdownBox arrow separation from border and items

values.name: DROPDOWN_ROLL_UP
values.description: DropdownBox roll up flag (default rolls down)

values.name: TEXT_READONLY
values.description: TextBox in read-only mode: 0-text editable, 1-text no-editable

values.name: LIST_ITEMS_BORDER_NORMAL
values.description: ListView items border enabled in normal state

values.name: HUEBAR_PADDING
values.description: ColorPicker right hue bar separation from panel

values.name: HUEBAR_SELECTOR_HEIGHT
values.description: ColorPicker right hue bar selector height

values.name: HUEBAR_SELECTOR_OVERFLOW
values.description: ColorPicker right hue bar selector overflow

functions.name: GuiIsLocked
functions.description: Check if gui is locked (global state)

functions.name: GuiSetAlpha
functions.description: Set gui controls alpha (global state), alpha goes from 0.0f to 1.0f

functions.name: GuiLoadStyle
functions.description: Load style file over global style variable (.rgs)

functions.name: GuiLoadStyleDefault
functions.description: Load style default over global style

functions.name: GuiIconText
functions.description: Get text with icon id prepended (if supported)

functions.name: GuiLoadIcons
functions.description: Load raygui icons file (.rgi) into internal icons data

functions.name: GuiDrawIcon
functions.description: Draw icon using pixel size at specified position

functions.name: GuiGetTextWidth
functions.description: Get text width considering gui style and icon size (if required)

functions.name: GuiWindowBox
functions.description: Window Box control, shows a window that can be closed

functions.name: GuiGroupBox
functions.description: Group Box control with text name

functions.name: GuiLine
functions.description: Line separator control, could contain text

functions.name: GuiPanel
functions.description: Panel control, useful to group controls

functions.name: GuiTabBar
functions.description: Tab Bar control, returns TAB to be closed or -1

functions.name: GuiButton
functions.description: Button control, returns true when clicked

functions.name: GuiLabelButton
functions.description: Label button control, returns true when clicked

functions.name: GuiCheckBox
functions.description: Check Box control, returns true when active

functions.name: GuiValueBox
functions.description: Value Box control, updates input text with numbers

functions.name: GuiValueBoxFloat
functions.description: Value box control for float values

functions.name: GuiTextBox
functions.description: Text Box control, updates input text

functions.name: GuiStatusBar
functions.description: Status Bar control, shows info text

functions.name: GuiMessageBox
functions.description: Message Box control, displays a message

functions.name: GuiTextInputBox
functions.description: Text Input Box control, ask for text, supports secret

functions.name: GuiColorPickerHSV
functions.description: Color Picker control that avoids conversion to RGB on each call (multiple color controls)

functions.name: GuiColorPanelHSV
functions.description: Color Panel control that updates Hue-Saturation-Value color value, used by GuiColorPickerHSV()
